name: azure-zabbix-templates
description: Zabbix monitoring templates for azure resources.

scripts.release: $(npm bin)/typings install && $(npm bin)/gulp release && npm install --production --prefix dist/azure-zabbix-templates
scripts.release_win: node_modules\.bin\typings install && node_modules\.bin\gulp release && npm install --production --prefix dist\azure-zabbix-templates
